sentence.Network_en: He was staunchly opposed to a public confession.
The broad masses of people and armymen fought staunchly with one heart and one mind to defeat the aggressors.
sentence.Network_cn: 广大军民同心同德,坚决打败入侵者.

sentence.Network_en: Nixon had great regard and affection for the staunchly pro - Western King Faisal.
sentence.Network_cn: 尼克松对坚定亲西方的费萨尔国王怀有高度尊重和友好的感情.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 左右为难的柏林 - FT速读测试 - FT中文网 ... hinge on 以…为转移，靠…转动 staunchly 坚定地；忠实地 rack up 积攒.
左右为难的柏林 - FT速读测试 - FT中文网 ... hinge on 以…为转移，靠…转动 staunchly 坚定地；忠实地 rack up 积攒.

list.abs: we will staunchly preserve the core values of our society ., 我们会坚决维护社会的核心价值.
he staunchly defended his principles ., 他坚定地维护自己的原则.
I still live staunchly even if you bit me ., 我一直顽强的活着即使你咬了我.
had great regard and affection for the staunchly pro - Western King Faisal., 尼克松对坚定亲西方的费萨尔国王怀有高度尊重和友好的感情.

entry.def: A staunch supporter or believer is very loyal to a person, organization, or set of beliefs, and supports them strongly.

example.ex: He's a staunch supporter of controls on government spending.
example.tran: 他坚决支持控制政府开支。

entry.def: To staunch the flow of something means to stop it.

example.ex: The government claims this is the only way to staunch the annual flow to Germany of hundreds of thousands of refugees...
example.tran: 政府称这是阻止每年数十万难民涌入德国的唯一办法。

example.ex: Efforts to staunch the spill of crude oil from a tanker off the north coast of Scotland are being held up by gale force winds.
example.tran: 为阻止苏格兰北部沿海一艘油轮的原油泄漏所进行的堵漏工作因风暴天气而告中断。

entry.def: To staunch a wound, or to staunch the blood from a wound, means to stop the wound from bleeding.

example.ex: Tom tried to staunch the blood with his handkerchief.
example.tran: 汤姆试图用手帕来止血。

auth_sentence.content: He is staunchly orthodox on issues of sexual morality.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is staunchly orthodox on issues of sexual morality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is staunchly orthodox on issues of sexual morality.

auth_sentence.content: But Islamic wear collides with its staunchly secular creed.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Islamic wear collides with its staunchly secular creed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Islamic wear collides with its staunchly secular creed.

auth_sentence.content: They are staunchly liberal in their voting habits.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are staunchly liberal in their voting habits.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are staunchly liberal in their voting habits.
